environment_notes: NuGet restore succeeded. .NET 10.0.102 SDK installed. GH_AW_GITHUB_TOKEN cannot push branches to remote repository. safeoutputs create_pull_request falls back to creating patch artifacts.
notes: Run 34. Issue #201 implemented (Blueprint×Terminal landing page redesign): complete redesign with JetBrains Mono + Space Grotesk fonts, blueprint grid bg, pipeline-first story. 62/62 tests pass. PR blocked by token scope — patch artifact created at /tmp/gh-aw/aw-repo-assist-issue-201-blueprint-terminal-landing-page.patch. Issue #202 (dashboard/tickets/activity pages) depends on #201 and is blocked until #201 merges. Issue #199 closed as PR #200.
